Package org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.menus

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Simple action listener interface used in the menu system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    Simple button used by the Menu system.
    Label
    Simple label, consisting of a TextMenuItem
    MenuItem
    Simple menu item, used in the menu system.
    TextMenuItem
    Simple menu item with a textual element.
